1152222121.content:
"Wait for me, I'm coming with you!" You heard him and nodded despite him not seeing you but waited, you saw a bright light coming from the entrance before fading instantly, a few seconds later, Tails himself entered the ship and smiled in seeing you.

"Great!" Tails beamed "We can now start!"

"Ehh... start what? Now that you mention it, what exactly is this ship's purpose for its size?"

"Well, its a Nanoship!" He boasted "I made it as a research and medical vessel but also work for espionage." He said in a proud voice, It was interesting to see how far he can go with his intelligence.

"And... you made for..."

"Well... I don't know, I just had the idea of making this, I guess because I can?" He then smiles to you "I don't plan to sell it or anything, Stars Above, no. this kind of tech isn't something people like the G.U.N or Eggman should get their hands on."

"I see.. I'm glad that you though and the consequence in making this... so a medical ship?" You asked

"No, exactly. More like a Science Ship, I don't know much about medicine." He said somewhat embarrassed. "It was to meant to enter into someone's body or to infiltrate into a heavily fortified facility but I never properly tested it." He says as he moved into a single corridor, you follow him shortly after, into the cockpit area with two seats in it. He sat on the right side while you on the left side. He pressed some buttons and the ship was beginning to turn on, hearing the sound of the engines, machinery, and computers coming to life around you. He held the controls as the ship began to hover upward and fly smoothly

"Alright! The Engine is functioning!" Tails announced, "Now testing Size changing feature!" He then pressed a button and things outside the cockpit began to grow considerably. "Alright! we had fully shrunk to one inch and systems are working normally!"

You stared in awe, Tails was a genious when coming to engineering but this was another whole level then you napped, looking at Tails..

"Hey... so... what is my point here then?"

"Uh?"

"I mean, you said you wanted an assitant but I'm doing nothing..."

"Oh relax, I just wanted company for this, I didn't... wanted to go through this alone, you can help me with the navigation if you want!" He say in a carefree smile which you return to."

"I see, thanks... So, Where are we going?" This made Tails to think then he smile, having an idea.
1152222121.title: Tails Micro Adventures: Reboot!

info.brief_description: You have fallen into the World of Sonic The Hedgehog. Have Fun.
info.description:
You were walking along one day and then were blinded by a white light. The next thing you know, you have shown up in the world of Sonic the Hedgehog. Now there are two ways this can go. You show up as one of the creatures in his world, or you show up as a human, but you are small compared to them. Like they can hold you in the palm of their hand. Well, you may just be a little smaller then them if you are turned Mobian, but there is a chance that you might be shrunk even as a mobian.

Now this story will not have other humans, aside from Eggman of course in it nor will there be characters like the robots from the older Sonic shows. However, I will allow characters like Sally from the older Sonic Shows, but you cannot mix older Sonic versions with the newer Sonic versions. So no mixing Sally and Amy or Sally and Blaze (Yes, I mean Blaze from the 2006 Sonic game.) into the same story.

Things that will be allowed in this story:
1. unbirth (anyone can be an unbirthee. Females can only be the unbirthers. No absorption)
2. birth/rebirth
3. breastfeeding
4. age regression (This can be caused by either when you are teleported to Mobius, or by means of magic or unbirth.)
5. transgender/trans-species of the main character. (This is only if you choose the main character is unbirthed.)
6. babying.
7. daiper usage. (Do not go in to description about it, or the chapter will be deleted.)
8. Oral Vore. (soft)
9. Breast Vore (No absorption)
10. pregnancy. (Only female characters)
11. Death of the villains
12. bad guys truned good.
13. straight couples. (Things like Sonic x Amy, or Silver x Blaze.)

Things that are not allowed in this story:
1. Digestion
2. absorption in the womb or the breast like I said earlier.
3. Death of any sort for the main character or the characters on the good side.
4. scat.
5. anal vore
6. hard vore
7. turning the good guys into villians. (This includes the main character)
8. Transgender/trans-species of anyone if they are not unbirthed.
9. short chapters. Make two sentences at least.
10. having the main character giant or overweight. (Like I stated earlier, you are shrunk if you're a human and/or possibly turned into a mobian.)
11. Cock vore. (I will only allow this in the event that the main character is put into a females womb afterwards.
12. Gay stuff. (all couples have to be straight as stated above.)

If there are any other things I haven't mentioned, let me know and tell you if I'll allow it. Have fun with this story, and please help me get at least 75 chapters up.
